column5: UNAUTHORIZEDIMMIGRANT SHARE OF LABOR FORCE, 2012
column6: SHARE OF K-12 STUDENTS WITH UNAUTHORIZED IMMIGRANT PARENT(S), 2012

column1: Note: All numbers are rounded independently and are not adjusted to sum to the total U.S. figure or other totals. Percents and changes calculated from unrounded figures. Significant changes are based on 90% confidence interval.
"B" -- Base of percent is too small to produce a reliable estimate.
Source: Pew Research Center estimates for 2009 and 2012 based on augmented American Community Survey data from Integrated Public Use Microdata Series (IPUMS)
